items.name: The Gaming Lounge
items.description: A vibrant spot for casual and competitive gamers, with high-end PCs and console setups.

items.name: VR Experience Zone
items.description: Dive into virtual worlds with state-of-the-art VR headsets and interactive games.

items.name: Retro Arcadian
items.description: Nostalgic arcade games, pinball machines, and classic console corner.

items.name: Tech Gadgets Emporium
items.description: Your one-stop shop for the latest gaming peripherals, hardware, and tech accessories.

items.name: Esports Arena Lagos
items.description: Home to professional esports tournaments and events, with spectator seating.

items.name: Board Game Haven
items.description: A cozy cafe offering a wide selection of board games for all ages.

items.name: Game Dev Hub
items.description: A collaborative space for aspiring game developers, workshops, and networking events.

items.name: Cybex Training Center
items.description: Official training grounds for competitive gamers, offering coaching and practice facilities.
